amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 118-280 to allow the Interior Secretary to provide housing for specified aliens when the originating state has failed to meet certain criteria.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow the Interior Secretary to provide housing for specified aliens when the originating state has failed to meet certain criteria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 223, 1 Present (Roll no. 688).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 223, 1 Present (Roll no. 688).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
